title.abbrev: HZ - A Data Format for Exchanging Files

front.title: HZ - A Data Format for Exchanging Files of Arbitrarily Mixed Chinese and ASCII characters

abstract.t: The content of this memo is identical to an article of the same title written by the author on September 4, 1989. In this memo, GB stands for GB2312-80. Note that the title is kept only for historical reasons. HZ has been widely used for purposes other than "file exchange".
